TopicTitle: Please give KSP1 a sound overhaul

Articles.Content:
Since you have the soundtrack and the rocket sounds done for KSP2. Would it be possible to give KSP1 an upgrade to the new soundtrack and rocket sounds from KSP2?
You can even make it a 5 dollar DLC. I would buy it.

I don't have the spare money to bring my system to a point where I can even hope to play KSP2 (optimization or not) and I would bet there are much more people in the same boat.
So please think about it.

Might I suggest https://github.com/ensou04/RocketSoundEnhancement/releases/tag/0.9.7

Doesn't do music though.

2 hours ago, JonnyOThan said:

Might I suggest https://github.com/ensou04/RocketSoundEnhancement/releases/tag/0.9.7

Doesn't do music though.

We've also got Soundtrack Editor Forked for your music!
Thanks for the mood suggestions. I'm going to try these out.

10 hours ago, Belafon said:

Since you have the soundtrack and the rocket sounds done for KSP2. Would it be possible to give KSP1 an upgrade to the new soundtrack and rocket sounds from KSP2?

The point of KSP 2 is to do more than what an overhaul of KSP 1 could achieve - I wouldn't hold your breath for... anything, at this point. It's coming up on 12 years old, runs on a codebase patched up from a very old version of Unity, and the only new content KSP 1 gets comes from mods.

10 hours ago, Belafon said:

I don't have the spare money to bring my system to a point where I can even hope to play KSP2 (optimization or not) and I would bet there are much more people in the same boat.

Optimization or not? That depends on how far the team will optimise the game. I wouldn't be so sure yet of whether or not 1.0 will run on your system.
